For the second time this season, Susan is pleased to be “behind the scenes” at AHP. She currently serves on the NKCT Board and has worked (in the pit, on stage and behind) with Penn State New Ken Forum Theatre, AHP , and New Works. Favorite on stage role is Eulalie in The Music Man. Favorite stage managing is Who’s Afraid of Virginia Wolff and Leading Ladies (NKCT), She is an account coordinator of Zoll LifeVest for the five New York boroughs. Susan thanks Ron, as always, for an enjoyable experience, the cast for being who they are, and Derek, Reed and Rose (making her debut any day now) for being her joy.
